function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Influence of COVID-19 on green building life cycle process","Impact":"Increased risk of contamination and spread of contagious diseases within green buildings","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene and sanitation protocols, ventilation improvements, and adoption of touchless technologies","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, touchless access controls, UV-C disinfection systems","People":"Occupants of green buildings, maintenance staff, visitors","Owner":"Building management, government authorities"},{"Description":"Variability of project effectiveness due to external environment changes","Impact":"Unpredictable impact of external factors on green building life cycle process effectiveness","Mitigation":"Continual monitoring of external environment, adaptive design strategies, flexible building systems","Technologies":"IoT sensors for environmental monitoring, machine learning for predictive analysis, flexible building materials","People":"Architects, engineers, project managers, urban planners","Owner":"Design and development teams, city planning authorities"},{"Description":"Rationality and economic significance of aims in green building life cycle process","Impact":"Potential trade-offs between economic rationality and disease prevention measures","Mitigation":"Cost-benefit analysis of disease prevention measures, sustainable finance strategies, multi-stakeholder collaboration","Technologies":"Sustainable finance tools, life cycle cost analysis software, virtual collaboration platforms","People":"Investors, developers, sustainability experts","Owner":"Investment firms, sustainable development organizations"}]}
